background_image_description: Soft, cloud-like radial gradient across the 1600x1600 canvas blending warm off‑white (#F4F1E7) at the corners into saturated sky blues (#2F73C7 and #3E88D8) concentrated on the right-center and lower-left; strong feathered vignetting. Over the gradient are three small four-point star sparkles (#FFFFFF) near the quote (one above-left of the first line, two below-right), and a very thin, slightly counter‑clockwise tilted elliptical orbit line (#FFFFFF at ~40% opacity) encircling the second line of text.
